Create New Account Email Address Confirm Email Password Confirm Password First Name Last Name Email Retype Email Question Answer Secret Question Secret Answer (Optional) Privacy Policy Terms and Conditions View… By creating an account, you are agreeing to the terms and conditions. Create Account In case you forget your password, please provide a security question and answer.\n\nA good security question is something that:\n\n - Only you know, and will not forget\n - Does not change over time\n - Has short, unambiguous spelling and capitalization.\n\nYou can choose one from the provided list, edit it, or make up one of your own.
What was the name of your first pet?
Where did you go on your honeymoon?
What were the last four digits of your childhood telephone number?
What city were you in on Dec 31, 1999?
What was the name of your 4th grade teacher?
Where were you when you had your first alcoholic drink?
What was your High School Mascot?
What is the make of your first car?
Who was your childhood hero?
What is the name of your favorite childhood friend?
What is the name of the place your wedding reception was held?
Account Settings Location Settings Times Stay in touch FAQ MyFlightbook is and will remain free. But if you find it valuable, we are happy to accept your support. Support MyFlightbook Additional Options Additional functionality and settings for your account is on MyFlightbook.com Go to MyFlightbook.com About MyFlightbook Facebook Twitter USE IN FLIGHT COULD VIOLATE REGULATIONS AND BE A DISTRACTION. YOU ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY CONSEQUENCES OF DOING SO! SEE 14 CFR 91.21 and 47 CFR 22.925 IN PARTICULAR Use of this during flight could be a distraction and could violate regulations, including 14 CFR 91.21 and 47 CFR 22.925.\nYou are responsible for the consequences of any use of this software. On appropriate hardware, MyFlightbook for Android can auto-detect take-offs and landings, and can record flight data for later analysis on MyFlightbook.com. Android is not an aviation-quality GPS, so these features are imperfect. Auto-fill ending Hobbs Auto-fill total time © 2012–2018 MyFlightbook LLC Portions of this code use the KSoap2 library at http://code.google.com/p/ksoap2-android/, licensed under the MIT license at http://www.opensource.org/licenses/mit-license.php. Error Unable to create/copy main database - the app won\'t work! Unable to create/copy airport database - nearest airport and mapping functionality won\'t work! Warning No GPS Unable to start GPS Service: Cannot save flight - no access to Internet. No connection to the Internet is available An unknown error has occurred talking to the MyFlightbook server. Please create at least one aircraft Unable to start camera. Unable to retrieve list of aircraft makes and models Cannot add aircraft You must be signed in to create an aircraft You must be signed in to view recent flights Selected flight was not found. No aircraft found. No aircraft were found for your account. You must create some before you can add flights Clean up complete; no issues found. Missing flights were found and have been moved to recent flights. Please type your email address twice to avoid typos. Please type your password twice to avoid typos. Please provide a secret question and answer in case you forget your password. SIM Prefix is reserved for simulators/FTDs/ATDs. Simulators/FTDs/ATDs must begin with the prefix \'SIM\' Aircraft does not begin with a valid country prefix. This feature requires Google Play services, which are not installed. There is nothing in this flight that can be shared. This flight cannot be sent.
Add this flight to your logbook I am sending you this flight from my logbook so that you can add it to yours.\n\nPlease go to %s to add it.\n\nYou will have the chance to review the flight and make any changes before the flight is saved.
